source_objects.title: Mobile Development
source_objects.description: Learn how to build your mobile app for iOS, Android and Kindle.

items.headline: Gain the proficiency to start a career as an iOS developer with Swift 3 & Xcode 8 (learn 10 different iPhone API's)
objectives_summary: Feel confident in your iOS app development skills.
Work with multiple developers on a single project using BitBucket.
Integrate third party library in your app using cocoapods.

items.title: An Introduction to Espresso Android Testing
items.headline: Automate Android native mobile application testing using Espresso and Java. Work with Android Devices and Emulators
objectives_summary: The core testing skills needed to become a great Mobile Tester in just 2 hours.
Setup Android Studio and Espresso Dependencies
Automate test cases using espresso and measure code coverage using Jacoco

objectives_summary: Flutter
Firebase
Android

objectives_summary: Full twitter clone with flutter
How to upload and retrieve Image files from Firebase Storage and Firebase Firestore
Flutter Frontend Development

items.title: Carousel UI from Scratch with Flutter
items.headline: Build an awesome carousel/on boarding ui all from scratch with flutter
objectives_summary: Flutter UI Development
Flutter UI basics
Flutter component Usage

items.title: Learn Google Flutter: Build Mobile Applications
items.headline: Mobile app development with Google Flutter
objectives_summary: Understand the fundamentals of the Flutter framework
Incorporate widgets and state into your app
Learn protocol and generic based networking

items.title: The Complete ARKit 3 Course - Build 11 Real world apps
items.headline: Learn ARKit 3,BodyTracking,MultipleFaceTracking,Collaborative Session,People Occulsion RealityKit,Reality Composer,Model
objectives_summary: Be able to build any app you want using apple latest technology ARKit 3
Build augmented reality apps for your business
Learn Apple latest technology RealityKit with Reality Composer

items.title: Xamarin Forms: Develop Native iOS, Android, and Windows Apps
items.headline: Xamarin.Forms Build native UIs for iOS, Android and Windows from a single, shared C# codebase.
objectives_summary: Create apps with Xamarin Forms
Create shared projects with Xamarin
Implement Xamarin Forms

items.title: React Native : Build Native Mobile Applications
items.headline: Build Native Mobile Applications for Android & iOS using JavaScript & React
objectives_summary: Develop cool native mobile applications using React Native
Understand the working of a react-native application

items.title: App Games Producer Course: A to Z App Publishing for All
items.headline: Learn how to reskin iPhone and iPad mobile games. For the COMPLETE BEGINNER. Includes many PRO tips and tricks as well.
objectives_summary: Reskin games fast and cheaply.

items.title: Mobile App Development with AWS and Java
items.headline: Learn from Beginner to Professional
objectives_summary: On completion of this course you would be in a position to write and deploy java programs.
And combine multiple programs to create some software application.
On completion of this course you would be able to develop and deploy your applications over Amazon Cloud- Amazon Web Services.

items.title: Create Your Own iPad & Android Publications
items.headline: Design and publish digital magazines & eBooks for iPad Kindle & Nook, with Adobe InDesign & Digital Publishing Suite.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to understand key differences between print and digital publications, and concept, build, preview and share an interactive digital publication.
I'll also show you how to start presenting your ideas using non-interactive .jpg interactive .pdf files.
Although this is not an App development course, I introduce some key concepts and provide resources for further exploration.

items.title: Build a Math Quiz iOS Game, no coding, source code included

objectives_summary: Publish your very own iOS (universal iPhone and iPad) game in the iTunes app store, quickly, without coding at all.

items.title: Android Development 2021 Practice Guide - Real World Android

visible_instructors.name: Oak
visible_instructors.job_title: Web & Mobile Development, IOS, Android, Ethical Hacking, IT
visible_instructors.title: Oak Academy

items.headline: Build 10 different real world android apps with my android app development course. Improve your hands-on android skills!
objectives_summary: Due to its open-source nature, working with the Android platform necessitates constantly learning about the Android platform. My android development course on Udemy keeps you ahead of this learning curve, with hands-on lectures on Android operating systems and more.
In this course, we will building 10 different Android Apps from scratch together.
Android applications' levels in this course are from easy to difficult

items.title: Learning Android Apps Development from Scratch
items.headline: Learn how to create your first Android Application and Publish it to google play store. With all the details from A to Z
objectives_summary: Develop Android App
Publish apps at google play store
